# PowerShell 5.1 Reference
> Authoritative syntax and cmdlet reference for Windows PowerShell 5.1.
> This index is optimized for syntax checking and legacy script validation.

## Agent Guidelines (PowerShell 5.1)
- **Strict Versioning**: This is version 5.1 (Desktop). Do NOT suggest Core (6+) features.
- **Forbidden Syntax**: No ternary operators (? :), no ?? null-coalescing, no class keywords.
- **Preferred Objects**: Use [PSCustomObject]@{} for objects. Use CimCmdlets over Wmi.

## Language Fundamentals (Syntax & Operators)
Core grammar rules for variables, loops, and error handling.

## Cmdlet Reference (By Module)
Comprehensive dictionary of available commands.

### Module: CimCmdlets
Modern CIM/WMI standard cmdlets (Prefer over Get-WmiObject).
- [Export-BinaryMiLog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Export-BinaryMiLog.md)
- [Get-CimAssociatedInstance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Get-CimAssociatedInstance.md)
- [Get-CimClass](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Get-CimClass.md)
- [Get-CimInstance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Get-CimInstance.md)
- [Get-CimSession](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Get-CimSession.md)
- [Import-BinaryMiLog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Import-BinaryMiLog.md)
- [Invoke-CimMethod](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Invoke-CimMethod.md)
- [New-CimInstance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/New-CimInstance.md)
- [New-CimSession](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/New-CimSession.md)
- [New-CimSessionOption](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/New-CimSessionOption.md)
- [Register-CimIndicationEvent](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Register-CimIndicationEvent.md)
- [Remove-CimInstance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Remove-CimInstance.md)
- [Remove-CimSession](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Remove-CimSession.md)
- [Set-CimInstance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/CimCmdlets/Set-CimInstance.md)

### Module: ISE
Integrated Scripting Environment (Legacy).
- [Get-IseSnippet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/ISE/Get-IseSnippet.md)
- [Import-IseSnippet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/ISE/Import-IseSnippet.md)
- [New-IseSnippet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/ISE/New-IseSnippet.md)

### Module: Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive
Zip file compression and extraction.
- [Compress-Archive](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive/Compress-Archive.md)
- [Expand-Archive](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AICyberGuardian/PowerShell-Docs/main/reference/5.1/Microsoft.PowerShell.Archive/Expand-Archive.md)

Engine lifecycle, PSSessions, jobs, and core cmdlets.
